name: UNDER (itch) (SolitaryStudios)
description:
"UNDER - A short war stories horror game"

STORY: You woke up in the middle of WW2 and realized that all of your comrades are gone. You now have to explore the place to find out the truth about what really happened and where do all your comrades go.

NOTE: This is just a short horror experience created by Keneth Agar of SolitaryStudios, a Filipino developer and made in just 1 week. Hope you enjoy playing!.

DONATION: This game is 100% Free and developing games is expensive. So any amount of donation will really help us to improve and to fund our upcoming games. Thank you!
